title: Germany stands with Hongkong
description:
Germany stands with Hongkong! What is necessary, what can be done to support Hongkong?
Thank you all for coming and joining our session. We thank you for supporting the struggle of the Hongkongers. I hope our message got across, we want you to get as much involved in the cause as you would like, get connected, form your own political circles and stage events you like. I compiled a bit of information for you, feel free to get in touch with us!<b>
